title: Complete HLB App
description: A full-featured PyQt5 application that manages login, dress rental, profit tracking, and includes AI voice support. Built using OOP in Python.

title: Terminal Q & A, with Marking System
description: A Python-based terminal application that presents users with questions, evaluates their answers, and scores them automatically. Great for self-testing and educational purposes.

title: Emmense Reader
description: An intelligent Python tool that transforms PDFs into a conversation, reads them aloud, and extracts every word—even from embedded images—so the user never misses critical content.

files.name: Click here to view Emmense Reader

title: Wi-Fi History Extractor
description: A Python script that retrieves all Wi-Fi networks your computer has previously connected to, using stored credentials. Useful for auditing and network diagnostics.

files.name: Click here to view Wi-Fi History Extractor

title: Smart HR Assistant
description: An intelligent HR automation system built with Tkinter and OOP in Python. It calculates salaries, adds overtime pay, recognizes employee names, and interacts via voice to assist HR professionals.
